title: About Noor Rashid
text:
I’m a data scientist and machine learning engineer with a passion for building production systems that create measurable business impact. My journey began at Oxford University, where I developed a strong foundation in statistical modeling and computational methods.
Current Focus: Transitioning from analytics-focused DS work into ML Engineering leadership roles, with deep dives into MLOps, distributed systems, and real-time inference architecture.

title: About Noor Rashid
text:
Technical Expertise

Machine Learning

Deep Learning: PyTorch (transformers, CNNs, RNNs), model fine-tuning, transfer learning
Classical ML: XGBoost, LightGBM, scikit-learn, feature engineering at scale
Specializations: Recommendation systems, time-series forecasting, NLP



ML Engineering & MLOps

Model Deployment: FastAPI, Docker, Kubernetes, model serving patterns
Experiment Tracking: MLflow, Weights & Biases, DVC
Orchestration: Airflow, Prefect, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions)
Monitoring: Prometheus, Grafana, model drift detection



Data Engineering

Languages: Python (expert), SQL (advanced), Spark (intermediate)
Databases: PostgreSQL, Snowflake, Redis
ETL/ELT: DBT, data validation frameworks (Great Expectations)



Cloud & Infrastructure

Platforms: AWS (SageMaker, EC2, S3), GCP (Vertex AI, BigQuery)
IaC: Terraform (learning), Docker Compose, Kubernetes manifests

title: Noor Rashid
text:

title: Noor Rashid
text:
About
Oxford-educated data scientist transitioning into ML Engineering leadership roles. Passionate about building robust, scalable ML systems and bridging the gap between research and production.
Currently: Building expertise in MLOps, distributed training, and real-time inference systems. Developing portfolio projects that demonstrate production-grade engineering practices.
Open to: Senior DS, MLE, and Lead roles at FAANG, high-growth startups, and quant firms.
